    • Hero

      public Hero​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      The constructor of hero, also known as the player
      参数:
      world - the interactable world
      colNum - the number of the column distinguished in World.txt
      rowNum - the number of the row specified in World.txt
